attributes.action: Reinstate Margaret Haywood and review how the NMC is run
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margret Haywood recording the appalling conditions at the Royal Sussex Hospital in Brighton for the BBC's Panorama in 2005 instead of being hailed a Hero her actions have cost her 20 year career

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
